content:
TITLE: Running FreqUI with Docker Compose
DESCRIPTION: Command to start a pre-built Docker container with FreqUI running on port 3000. This runs the latest version of FreqUI as a standalone service that connects to a separately running Freqtrade bot.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freqtrade/frequi/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose up -d
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building and Running Docker Version
DESCRIPTION: Commands to build the Docker image and run it in detached mode, making FreqUI available on http://localhost:3000/.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freqtrade/frequi/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker-compose build
docker-compose up -d

# Access using http://localhost:3000/
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running FreqUI in Development Mode
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile and run the project with hot-reloading for development purposes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freqtrade/frequi/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building FreqUI for Production
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile and minify the project for production deployment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freqtrade/frequi/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing FreqUI Development Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the project dependencies using pnpm package manager for local development of FreqUI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freqtrade/frequi/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Docker Dev Environment
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up a Docker development environment without VSCode by building the dev docker image and running the container detached.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freqtrade/frequi/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd .devcontainer
docker-compose up -d
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Entering Docker Container for Development
DESCRIPTION: Command to access the shell of the running web service container for development purposes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freqtrade/frequi/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker-compose exec web /bin/bash
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Linting and Fixing Code Issues
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the linter and automatically fix code style issues.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freqtrade/frequi/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run lint
```
